comments: Continued fraction expansion for Integrate[Binomial[1,x], {x,0,1}]. - Joseph Biberstine (jrbibers(AT)indiana.edu), Apr 13 2006Integral(sin(x)/x dx) = x - x^3/(3*3!) + x^5/(5*5!) - x^7/(7*7!) + ... - _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 28 2009
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); y=0; x=Pi; m=x; x2=x*x; n=1; nf=1; s=1; while (x!=y, y=x; n++; nf*=n; n++; nf*=n; m*=x2; s=-s; x+=s*m/(n*nf)); x*=2/Pi; x=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 20000, write("b036791.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 28 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
